Manufacturer Authorized representative in the European Section 2 Introduction 5.1.4 Adjusting Volume 2.1 Intended Use When device is working, you can adjust volume by rotating encoder switch. 5.1.5 Cleaning Work The device is used to detect the fetal heart rate. The device can be used by After finishing using the device, please turn off the equipment in time and wipe health care professionals including nurses, midwives, specialized technicians in the gel on the probe and skin, put the probe into the probe slot. hospital, clinic, community and home. The 2 MHz and 3 MHz probe are used for detection of fetal heart rate. 5.2 Recording，Re-playing and Burning The 5 MHz and 8 MHz probes are used for detection of veins and arteries blood flow for assisting to detect periphery vascular disease. The fetal sound rate signal can be transferred to personal computer and recorder by its sound corder.The sound files can be re-played, burnt into 2.2 Product Features CD disk or sent to others by e-mail. Different models have different features as follows. Function SONOTRAX PRO Display Colour Build-in speaker Yes Volume adjustable Yes Audio recording Yes Ni-Mh battery Yes Battery indicator Yes Audio alarm Yes Light alarm Yes FHR curve Yes Probe detect Yes Various work modes Yes Various display modes Yes Earphone Optional PC software Optional Carry case Optional Trolley Optional 2.0MHz probe Yes 2.5MHz probe Optional Section 5 Inspecting and Recording 3.0MHz probe Optional Printing system Optional 5.1 Inspecting FHR 5.1.1 Gel Usage Daub ultrasonic gel on the probe faceplate to decrease noise and boost up test 5.1.2 Finding the Position of Fetus Firstly, please feel the fetal position by hand. Place the working faceplate on abdomen with feasible tight contact. Adjust the probe position to obtain an optimum audio signal. Usually, the heart position of the fetus with small gestational age is on the 1/3 of the line from the umbilicus to symphysis pubis, and with increasing of the gestational age the position will shift upward and deviate to the left or right slightly. NOTE: Do not compress probe too tightly on abdomen surface to avoid to weaken signal and affect the auscultation result. NOTE: When searching for the fetal heartbeat, do not pull the probe on the abdominal surface to avoid the noise. NOTE: Do not put the probe on the position where there is strong Placental Blood Sound(PBS) or strong.
4.1 Inspeksi Umum: 5.1 Inspecting FHR ............................................................................................ 20 5.2 Recording, Re-playing and Burning ............................................................. 21 Section 6 Cleaning and Disinfecting ...................................................................... 22 5.1.3 FHR Inspecting Finish setting mode and parameters, press power On/Off key to start work, press power On/Off key again to stop working. NOTE: Do not measure FHR unless audible and identifiable fetal sound has been heard, usually it needs about 5 seconds. NOTE: The normal value of the fetal heart rate is 120-160bpm. 100-120bpm and 160-180bpm are the critical values which should be paid some attention to. And lower than 100bpm and more than 180bpm are danger values which should be paid more attention to. After ending test, press back power switch to turn off the power. Section 3 Appearance NOTE: The device will automatically turn off with 3 minutes if it is not used. 3.1 Appearance 1) Main Body 2) Printer Cover 3) AC Light 4) Power On/Off 5) Power Light 6) Printing Key 7) Alarm On/Off Key 8) Freezing Key 9) Display interface switching 10) Playback Key 11) Zoom key 12) Encoder Switch 13) Probe connection port 14) Earphone Port 15) USB Port 16) Power Switch 17) DC Port 18) Probe 19) Printer Key 20) Water-proof Parts 3.2 Display 3.2.1 The display type is as follows Curve Parameters and FHR Digit Large Digit 3.2.2 The menu displays are as follows 3.3 Controlling Keys 4.5 Setting Parameter and Working Operation In 3.1 main unit configuration, there are nine keys as follows. 3.3.1 Power ON/OFF 1) Press the encoder switch to enter into menu setting , rotate to required menu When power switch is on, press key once to turn on the device. and press the encoder switch again, rotate the encoder switch to select the When the device is working, press key for 3 seconds to turn off the device. parameters and press the encoder switch to confirm. Rotate to select menu and 3.3.2 Printing Key press again to exit the menu setting. When the device equipped with printing function and install printer, the print key will The setting parameters are automatically saved. be used, otherwise the print key is reserved key. Put the paper in print storehouse, the device will check it automatically, and then can start When working, press key to freeze the display on screen. to open and close the print function. Print key to start printing .and press key again When working, press Encoder Switch to increase or reduce the FHR volume. to stop printing. The printing speed can be set in menu: 1cm/min, 2cm/min, 3cm/min. When working, press alarm key to turn or turn off the alarm voice. 3.3.3 Freezing Key Press key to freeze FHR on LCD will be freezed. This will keep till another Press print key to start or stop printing. measurement starting, changing the mode or pressing this key again. 3.3.4 Display interface switching 4.6 Assembling Paper Press key to Display interface switching. Press the sliding key at the side of device, open the paper cassete, take out 3.3.5 Playback Key the paper shaft, assemble the paper on the shaft, place the shaft with paper into the paper cassete, and close the paper casset cover. press key to Playback of stored data. The recording paper should be thermal recording paper with 50mm width and 3.3.6 Zoom key without grid. 4.7 Storing and Playing back Press key to Zoom the current curve display interface. 3.3.7 Encoder Switch press key to Playback of stored data.by rotating encoder switch, the storage When working, rotating the encoder switch is to adjust volume. Press the encoder switch to enter into menu setting, rotate to required menu and press data can be played back with displaying FHR curve and time mark of 2 minutes the encoder switch again, rotate the encoder switch to select the parameters and press length for every picture. the encoder switch to confirm. Rotate to select menu and press again to exit the menu 4.8 Turn off the Device When the device is power on and being work state, press the key again for 3 seconds, the device is power off and the working indicator light is off. 3.3.8 Power Switch Section 4 Basic Operation Turn on the back power switch , the front switch is feasible,on and off. 4.1 Preparing to Use Turn off the back switch, the front switch is infeasible, and the battery is recharged.
